name: an-otter-wiki
description: OtterWiki is a lightweight self-hosted wiki engine with a modern UI and Git-based storage. It supports Markdown, version control, and collaborative editing with user access controls.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write and edit pages using Markdown syntax with live preview and syntax highlighting

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Clean, responsive web interface optimized for both desktop and mobile editing experiences

features.title: User Management
features.description: Control access with user accounts, permissions, and role-based editing capabilities

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find content quickly with full-text search across all wiki pages and attachments

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and manage images, documents, and other files with automatic linking and organization

features.title: Collaborative Editing
features.description: Enable multiple users to edit and contribute content with conflict resolution and merge capabilities
